body.name: EZDIY-FAB GPU VGA PCIe 8 Pin U Turn 180 Degree Angle Connector Power Adapter Board for Desktop Graphics Card-Reverse Type 3-Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 30 mins
features: Designed for changing PCIE 8PIN cable installation direction. Attention to the GPU connector direction before purchasing.
Package included 3 adapters of Reverse Type of connector interface adapters, Please check the connector interface type on your GPU before purcahsing.
180 Degrees U turn design, connecting between PSU Cable and GPU connector, does not cause pressure on the GPU connector for long-term stable use
Can install the 8pin PSU PCIE cable from vertical to horizontal direction with this adapter to fit in height limited chassis
These adapters are for using on PCIe connectors, compatible to all graphics cards such as: ASUS, ASRock, EVGA ,Gigabyte, Radeon, Sapphire, NVIDIA, etc.; Mind the connector type before purchasing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Attention To The Direction of your GPU Power Connector
CONNECTION NOTE Please ensure that the connector is secure and intact

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Looking, Inexpensive, Functional & SAFE
reviews.reviewText: Don't let some other reviews fool you about these being unsafe. It seems that there are some people reviewing these that understand how to use a multi-meter, but don't really understand how GPU's are powered. Yes, all of the ground pins are common as are the three 12v pins. This is NOT dangerous, and it is NOT a short as these people are implying. It seems they decided to use a single ground plane and a single 12v plane on the circuit board. The GPU only uses 12v and ground. As long as you're getting the proper signal on the proper pins, which all five that I've bought do, you're perfectly fine. If you were finding the ground and 12v bridged... that would be a short, and would be absolutely dangerous. Not a single one of these that I've bought have had a short. You can ignore the reviews saying these are unsafe because the grounds are all common as well as the 12v, and that's perfectly safe for this applications. These people simply do not understand what they're talking about.As to the rest of the product. They do what they do well, they're constructed about as well as you can expect them to be and they look quite good... much better than the majority that just put some foam on the back to protect the exposed circuit board. Above all else, they're safe to use. My one complaint is that there is no latch, which makes sense if the latch is on the inside of the connector as it would be very hard to reach. However, once connected, the connection is pretty snug and they don't back out easily.I'm using a different set on a 3070 Ti and they've been working great. I was using this set on a 3080 Ti, but opted to go with the Thermal Grizzly WireView. Not for any shortcomings of this product, but the way I have the GPU setup and my custom cables, it was pulling on these in a way I didn't like and the WireView is a single block making it more ridged for this application. It's also nice that it can display how much wattage and current the GPU is currently consuming in real time. However, it is quite a bit more expensive.If you need a 180° adapter and you don't want to spend a lot, but you want it to look nice, these are a must. Just be sure that the orientation is correct for your GPU. A lot of people are giving these bad reviews because they didn't read and bought the wrong kit. If you're willing to spend more and you'd like to be able to see the current power consumption, I highly recommend the Thermal Grizzly WireView.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans up the look of my motherboard (glass side case cover)
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, eliminates the heavy wires that stand out from my motherboard. When you build or purchase a glass sided case, everyone can see every cable connection on the motherboard. This keeps the heavy cable from the power supply, out of sight. Nice product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes installing GPR cables much easier
reviews.reviewText: Found these buy chance while looking for white extension cables for my PSU and GPU. Picked them up on a whim and very happy I did. Very convenient little adapter clips for connecting my GPU cables and work as intended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not work on 30 series rog strix GPUs.
reviews.reviewText: These connectors do not work on Asus rog strix 30 series graphics cards. 2 will go in but the 3rd will not. Contacted seller and they returned $ and removed 2 photos showing 30 series. Still have a photo that shows connection type using the strix card. Just be warned, 3 will not work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look good and they work
reviews.reviewText: These did the job, no power loss or fluctuations and fit my fat backed GPU. I mean you can see them on my 7800xt. They work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Throttled power to my GPU.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t recommend these, my GPU kept turning off due to insufficient power. After I took these off, worked perfectly fine, don’t cheap out on these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical, simple and inexpensive adapter to help with cable management.
reviews.reviewText: The EZDIY-FAB 8-Pin 180 Degree Angle GPU Adapter are great connectors to help with cable managemnt on yor PC case.These adapters appears to have a very good quality and they fit snugly on the 8-pin port. They are supper convinient and easy to install, allowing you to route PCIe power cables without bending them and helping with the case aesteticsJust make sure you get the right ones by checking the GPU 8-pin connectors.There are "Standard" and "Reverse" 180° adapters available and they are compatible with different graphics card models.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty cool!! Work great. Once new PSU comes, it'll look a lot better. Big improvement.
Works great and ascetically pleasing. Far less mechanical stress on your GPU and power cables. An absolute must for the discerning enthusiast.

Los compré porque tengo un gabinete muy estrecho y los cables de la tarjeta de gráficos golpeaban contra la tapa, pero con este con estos adaptadores puedo conectar los cables por encima de la trajeta sin que estorben a la tapa.

reviews.reviewTitle: Out of the box, fit perfectly, worked great
reviews.reviewText: After checking the plug orientation, as explained in the product description, I ordered a set for a vertically mounted GPU. The plugs fit the card perfectly, and hid the power cables behind the card for a very clean look. Definitely will pick up again on a new build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality plastic, looks way better than the standard connectors, 5 Stars :)
Con este producto los cables van directamente a la tarjeta gráfica y no se notan, parecen se buene calidad y no he tenido problemas para ahora
